el:comments.el:code: Lua 5.1 and XML converted by Leveladministrators

el:protected.el:luamain:
level = { " ", " ##..--++++++--..## ", " 0#---. .---#0 ", " ##....++++++....## ", " #O....| |....## ", " ##----| |----## ", " 0#.... ....#0 ", " ##----| |----## ", " ##....| |....## ", " ##....++++++....## ", " 0#---. .---#0 ", " ##..--++++++--..## ", " "}
cells={} cells[" "]=abyss cells["#"]=cell{floor="fl-stwood"} cells["+"]=cell{item="it-crack3",floor="fl-wood"} if difficult then cells["-"]=cell{parent=cells["+"]} else cells["-"]=cell{parent=cells["#"]} end if difficult then cells["."]=cell{parent=cells[" "]} else cells["."]=cell{parent=cells["#"]} end
if difficult then cells["|"]=cell{parent=cells["+"]} else cells["|"]=cell{parent=cells[" "]} end
oxyd_default_flavor = "a"
set_default_parent(cells["#"]) create_world_by_map(level,cells)
oxyd_shuffle()
enigma.ConserveLevel = FALSE
